we deliver ROI solutions and positive cashflow

Our products and services

We partner with your business to cut energy costs and convert you to sustainable power. We do this all without interrupting the day-to-day running of your business, and improving your overall bottom line.

Solar

Gravitas Energy experts design and install the highest quality Tier 1 solar PV modules and inverters. We have a variety of options that can be tailored to your individual requirements and to maximise the benefits of your solar system. We aim to maximise your return on investment by supplying a variety of cash flow positive solutions, putting money in your pocket from Day 1.

Co-gen and Tri-gen solutions

Gravitas Energy can ensure that your excess thermal energy is put to good use by designing and recommending solutions specific to your industry. Co-Gen and Tri-Gen solutions are ideal for hospitals and medical facilities, hotels and hospitality venues, residential and commercial multilevel buildings, industrial and manufacturing plants and even schools and universities.

Solar PV for Irrigators

Gravitas works with the agricultural sector to bring sustainable solutions to high energy users. A solar array can be sized to meet any scale of power demand, meaning that the potential of using solar to pump water is limitless. Solar pumping systems are suitable for drip-feed and spray systems where daytime pumping is required. Storage dams or tanks can be utilised for off-peak irrigation and pumps connected directly to solar PV systems deliver >90% efficiency.

Power Factor Correction (PFC)
& Variable Speed Drives (VSD)

Gravitas Energy offers a full analysis of your energy bills and consumption. We can recommend Power Factor Correction (PFC) equipment to stabilise your load and ensure that you are not paying more than you need to for your energy. Variable Speed Drivers (VSD) are another option that can also improve your energy efficiency and lower operational energy costs.

Energy efficient lighting

Gravitas Energy experts can recommend options and facilitate the installation of energy efficient LED lighting. Our commercial LED lighting solutions cover the needs of all industries and can guarantee savings of up to 84% on your electricity bill for lighting.

System performance monitoring and maintenance

Gravitas offers customers access to intelligent system performance monitoring and reporting as well as scheduling maintenance inspections as required by Australian Standards AS/NZS 5033.

Energy storage solutions

We are now able to offer Energy Storage solutions as the perfect complement to solar PV systems. Our Energy Storage solutions are ready to use and can be upgraded or expanded as necessary to meet your usage and needs.

Energy brokerage

Gravitas Energy experts help customers to navigate their energy contracts to ensure that they are paying the best prices for the most reliable of services.
